data.title: Why was Wiz Khalifa arrested in Romania during the performance at Beach Please! Festival?
data.meta_description: Wiz Khalifa was arrested in Romania after smoking marijuana on stage during a festival performance. Wiz Khalifa has a history of publicized drug use. Last year, he admitted to being high on magic mushrooms while throwing a baseball pitch.
data.text:
Synopsis

Wiz Khalifa was arrested in Romania after smoking marijuana on stage during a festival performance. Wiz Khalifa has a history of publicized drug use. Last year, he admitted to being high on magic mushrooms while throwing a baseball pitch.

Wiz Khalifa, whose real name is Cameron Thomaz, ran into legal problems in Romania over the weekend after consuming marijuana while performing at the Beach Please! Festival. The event happened on July 13, Saturday, at the festival at the Costinesti resort in Constanta County. Social media users rapidly shared footage of the rapper smoking on stage, as per the reports of MSN.

Law enforcement confirmation

The charges were later confirmed by a press release from Romanian law enforcement. Khalifa was discovered in possession of more than 18 grams of cannabis, a high-risk substance, according to the Directorate for Investigating Organized Crime and Terrorism. While performing, he took in additional cannabis in the form of an artisanal cigarette.

Wiz Khalifa apologizes

As per the reports of MSN, Wiz Khalifa apologized on social media after the incident. He clarified that by smoking on stage, he didn't mean to disrespect Romania. He acknowledged the authorities for their respect for his message, and they later released him. The rapper promised to return to Romania in the future but without a big joint.

Also Read: Gareth Southgate drops big Harry Kane reveal after England's Euro 2024 loss

Wiz Khalifa's previous drug use

Wiz Khalifa's drug use has previously garnered media attention. After he threw the opening pitch during a baseball game between the Pittsburgh Pirates and Cleveland Guardians last year, he acknowledged that he was intoxicated on magic mushrooms. The experience of throwing a baseball while "shroomed out" was described as "crazy" in a tweet he sent about his plan to get high before the pitch.

Social media users posted the video of Khalifa being led away from the festival site by police in huge numbers. They reached out to Khalifa's representatives for more information. The incident highlights the current public conversation about drug use among celebrities, particularly in nations with harsh drug prohibitions, as per the reports of MSN.

FAQs:

What happened to Wiz Khalifa in Romania?

Wiz Khalifa was arrested in Romania for smoking marijuana on stage during his performance at the Beach Please! Festival on July 13.

Did Wiz Khalifa apologize for the incident?

Yes, Wiz Khalifa apologized on social media, stating he did not mean to disrespect Romania by smoking onstage.
